channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Email Encoder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Email Encoder

item.title: CVE-2024-4483|2024-08-01T20:40:47.409Z -- unknown -- email%20encoder
item.description: The Email Encoder WordPress plugin before 2.2.2 does not escape the WP_Email_Encoder_Bundle_options[protection_text] parameter before outputting it back in an attribute in an admin page, leading to a Stored Cross-Site Scripting
